name: Color Drop - Virtual Geometry Shade Spotter Dash
name_original: Color Drop - Virtual Geometry Shade Spotter Dash
description:
When color blocks drop from the sky, react fast & move quickly!

Color Drop - A creative puzzle game is here for you! Intuitive control, simple interface and endless challenges!

Features:
- Random color setting excites your curiosity
- Three different modes to choose: 3, 4 and 5 columns

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Merge the same color to get a darker one
2. Clear the row of the same color
3. Stop the stack from reaching the top

Free to play! Get it now!
